Question: RoyalTek Company Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
RoyalTek Company Ltd.

Product Highlight: CES 2024 Exhibition

- Location awareness, ADAS radar, and AI Camera solution showcased at Booth#3967
- Innovations in automotive technology including Commercial Vehicle Total Solution, 79 GHz Radar Surrounding Solution, 3-in-1 AI Camera System, Connected DVR System, and Motorcycle Radar + IVI Solution
- RAR-7200 Radar with comprehensive protection, featuring FOV 180°, Blind Spot Detection System (BSD), Parking Assist System (PAS), and Lane Change Alert System (LCA)
- Global leader in satellite positioning and wireless communication technology, providing solutions for AVN, PND, IVI, ADAS, DMS, BSIS, MOIS, OMS, and DVR
- Commitment to excellence in research, development, manufacturing, and customer service, ensuring products exceed expectations and deliver maximum value to customers
Summary_cn:
RoyalTek有限公司

产品亮点：CES 2024展览

- 位置感知、ADAS雷达和人工智能摄像头解决方案在展位#3967展出
- 创新的汽车技术包括商用车总解决方案、79 GHz雷达环绕解决方案、3合1人工智能摄像头系统、连接式DVR系统以及摩托车雷达+IVI解决方案
- RAR-7200雷达具备全面保护功能，包括180°视野、盲点检测系统(BSD)、停车辅助系统(PAS)和变道警报系统(LCA)
- 全球领先的卫星定位和无线通信技术提供商，为AVN、PND、IVI、ADAS、DMS、BSIS、MOIS、OMS和DVR等提供解决方案
- 致力于卓越的研发、制造和客户服务，确保产品超出期望，为客户提供最大价值。
